===== Default Aid Type ===== 

==== Example Usage ====

The code should be declared in any usage of this element:

<code xml>
   <default-aid-type code="A02"/>
</code>

Additionally, a text description of the code can be provided:

<code xml>
    <default-aid-type code="A02">Sector Budget Support</default-aid-type>
</code>

Where this text description is in a language that differs from the default, then this should be declared accordingly:

<code xml>
    <default-aid-type code="A02" xml:lang="fr">Soutien budgetaire sectoriel</default-aid-type>
</code>
